title: Pls help
body: I have been trying to figure this out for awhile and would really like some help. Game gets to champ select and when its supposed to oad the loading screen, it's just a black screen I can't get away from. I can't alt+ctrl+delete out of it, nor can I get out by any means necessary, I have to hard restart my comp which is a pain in the bum. I have tried uninstalling/reinstalling with no luck. Used both old and new client, no difference. My graphics card is fine and working properly. (I have other, heavier requirement games I own that have no problems loading.) I have also tried mulitple sweeps with anti-virus and no problems. Please if you could make any suggestions I'm at a loss and just wanna get a game in. Thanks!

replies.body:
It sounds like League is unable to properly access your graphics device. I've seen this happen for a few reasons, but first up, I need to verify this isn't caused by a problematic feature called *Game DVR* that resides in the Windows Game Bar in Windows 10. If you're running 10, follow [**these steps**](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to ensure this feature is disabled.

Let me know if this caused any changes to your symptoms.
